name: Ext_R5_DocumentReference_docStatus
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DocumentReference.docStatus for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DocumentReference.docStatus from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DocumentReference|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: registered | partial | preliminary | final | amended | corrected | appended | cancelled | entered-in-error | deprecated | unknown
element.definition: The status of the underlying document.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.docStatus` maps to R4B `DocumentReference.docStatus`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `DocumentReference.docStatus` has no related element in R4B:Media
